responses.title: My iron will shall break them.
I'll break their spirits and their backs.
The first of many a blooded enemy.
hum hum, I have their scent.
One world is much like another.
Heh eh heh aheh heh ah hach ehh heh heh.
From this plane to the next.
You'll be dead before you know it.
Thought you had me, didn't you?
That did not go as expected.
Didn't see me coming, did you.
I send you beyond this plane.
Don't fret. Your worries are over.
Your spirit, like your life, is broken.
You were no match for the spirit breaker.
Hehu, I wet my horns in you.
Death has many doors; I open one for you.
Mine is the anvil on which your spirit broke.
Now you walk between the planes.
Heh eh eg heh heh h heh heh.
I'll trample your bones to dust, skeleton. (10% Chance)
An eye for an eye, for an eye. (10% Chance)
Leshrac, I expected more from a fellow walker between the planes. (20% Chance)
Sniper, hunting season is over. (20% Chance)
Choose this plane or the next, Spectre, don't try to live in both. (20% Chance)
Enchantress, did you choose that form yourself? (20% Chance)
Storm Spirit, I am a storm chaser. (20% Chance)
Earthshaker, time for some shake and break.
Leshrac, a fellow walker between the planes.
From this plane, I am driven.
There is help for all things but death.
I was unique to this plane.

name: Upon activating Aegis of the Immortal

responses.title: Death is no obstacle to these horns.
And there I go. Psyche! (5% Chance)
Hmm, lost my way between the worlds for a moment.
All is grist for the mill.
I'm the beast of many parts; I part enemies from their lives.
I do only as I would be done by.
I'm a being of many parts.
Who's in charge of this plane, anyway?
A golden key opens many a war chest.
A dagger sharper than my horns.
Ah, Planeswalker cloak! The better to walk between the planes.
Now that's my type of cloak.
I have lost my way between the planes.
This is complete and utter bullsh! (5% Chance)
A golden door thrown wide between the planes.
My continuation on this plane is assured.
Swiftly to the breaking point. (2.5% Chance)
Ah, I'll gore my foes upon each horn. (5% Chance)
The spirit is strong in this one.
Six horns are better than two. (25% Chance)
My form walks between the planes.
